articles.title: First case of rare blood-clotting condition linked to J&J vaccine diagnosed in Utah - KSL.com
articles.description: Doctors reiterated that the chances of developing the blood clotting condition from the Johnson & Johnson vaccine is extremely rare. The risk of contracting COVID-19 and developing severe symptoms from the disease is much higher.
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY The first case of a rare blood-clotting condition thought to be linked to the Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine has been diagnosed in Utah.

articles.title: Six children hospitalized after being infected with E. coli in King County - KING5.com
